name: patterns-plugin-feather
description: A plugin command script for the Patterns CLI that will compile a feather icon sprite from the source. Maintained by @nycopportunity.

name: patterns-plugin-twig
description: A plugin command script for the Patterns CLI that will compile Twig view templates. Replaces the default Slm compiler. Maintained by @nycopportunity.

name: patterns-plugin-properties
description: A plugin command script for the Patterns CLI that will compile a JSON object containing design tokens into CSS Custom Properties using the css-vars-from-json package.
